description:
io: add a double-ended pipe.

This is preliminary. If it seems useful (I think it's helpful for testing some networking functions) I'll add better testing and support for CloseWithError.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
default

On 7 December 2011 05:15,  <Anschelsc@gmail.com> wrote:
> +// This is useful for testing functions that expect a network connection.

see net.Pipe.

On 2011/12/07 09:26:53, rog wrote:
> On 7 December 2011 05:15,  <https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&tf=1&to=Anschelsc@gmail.com> wrote:
> > +// This is useful for testing functions that expect a network connection.
> 
> see net.Pipe.

Thanks for pointing me to that. Shall I close this then?

On Wed, Dec 7, 2011 at 10:02,  <Anschelsc@gmail.com> wrote:
> Thanks for pointing me to that. Shall I close this then?

sure (hg change -d 5448128)

subject: code review 5448128: io: add a double-ended pipe.
